column4: i just installed the dapper kernel, and now when i boot it hangs at a black screen. in recovery mode it says /dev/hda1 doesn't exist (!)
do you have the old kernel in grub still?>
when i upgraded, it updated grub
hmm maybe i can help... can you give me a "gist" of what crappened?
i've started upgrading from breezy to dapper, trying to avoid upgrading packages with bugs. i upgraded the kernel, and rebooted, and now it hangs at a black screen
hmm... specifics.. p4 or the like?
curoius as to what kernel got installed
that is what i upgraded. and i can't do that now because i can't boot at all
you should be able to boot the old one.. otherwise the problem lies elsewhere
interesting... yeah Mr_Miyagi was thinking grub is angry
grub appears fine... it's after that
